greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(n,k) (1<=k<=n) given by T(n, 1) = T(n,n) = 1, otherwise T(n, k) = (m*n-m*k+1)*T(n-1,k-1)+(m*k-m+1)*T(n-1,k), where m = -2.
maple: if (n=1 or k=1 or k=n) then 1 else
for n from 1 to 14 do lprint([seq(T(n,k,-2),k=1..n)]); od;
mathematica: T[n_, k_, l_] := T[n, k, l] = If[n == 1 || k == 1 || k == n, 1, (l*n-l*k+1)*T[n-1, k-1, l]+(l*k-l+1)*T[n-1, k, l]]; Table[T[n, k, -2], {n, 1, 14}, {k, 1, n}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Jan 09 2014, translated from Maple *)
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_ and _Roger L. Bagula_, May 08 2013
